Name: Ark Eden
Description: A charity, aiming to preserve Lantau Island's ecological, geographical, historical and cultural heritage. Ark Eden wants to change how Hong Kong is portrayed i.e. a concrete jungle

Name: S NineE by Susanna Soo
Description: An enterprise and a local designer label for women, designing items such as evening gowns and bespoke dresses. Founded in 2009, S. Nine by Susanna Soo rapidly became successful and they were also recently featured in the LV City Guide. S. Nine by Susanna Soo recently opened a shop front at PMQ.

Name: Eden Ministry
Description: Aims to free vulnerable women from prostitution and provide them with a safe haven in which they may be counseled and also benefit from employment. It sells jewelry made by the rescued women to fund its initiatives.

Name: Ebenezer School For The Visually Impaired
Description: A school for the visually impaired in Hong Kong. The school is dedicated to helping their students to integrate into mainstream schools and to become contributive members of our society.

Name: Lizzie Bee
Description: An organization that uses art to empower by providing free art workshops for the elderly, disabled, widowed, orphaned, amongst others.

Name: Hong Kong Rehabilitation Power
Description: A social enterprise that runs a number of convenience stores  in HK and employs disabled persons.

Name: Add Oil Education
Description: a South East Asian creative education enterprise, operating in Hong Kong, Singapore and Malaysia.
